column1: Genetic & Genomic Counselling (with Work Placement) - MSc(MedSci)
column5:
Designed to give you a working knowledge of the principles and practice of Genetic Counselling qualifying you to practice as a Genetic and Genomic Counsellor.
              


              This programme is accredited by the UK Genetic Counsellor Registration Board.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
